Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Sam Liprie "SL"
Reviews.Content: Product came as described with no problems. Excellent value for the money.  Shopped around for a long time and could not beat this deal.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 II IS Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
16GB SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card + Multi 50 in 1 USB Card Reader
Rechargeable LPE8 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger with Car Adapater
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Carry Bag + Mini HDMI to HDMI 6 Foot Cable
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
